Package com.example.employ_events.ui.notifications

Class Notification

java.lang.Object
com.example.employ_events.model.Notification
public class Notification extends Object
Author:
Sahara, Tina, Aasvi Represents a notification for event-related actions, such as invitations, cancellations, or waitlist updates. Provides functionality for creating and sending notifications to users.

  • Constructor Details

    • Notification

      public Notification(String eventID, String message, boolean read, String CHANNEL_ID)
      Constructs a Notification object with the specified event ID, message, and read status.
      Parameters:
      eventID - the unique identifier of the event associated with the notification
      message - the message content of the notification
      read - indicates whether the notification has been read

    • isInvitation

      public boolean isInvitation()
      Checks whether the notification is an invitation.
      Returns:
      true if it's an invitation, false otherwise

    • setInvitation

      public void setInvitation(boolean invitation)
      Sets whether the notification is an invitation.
      Parameters:
      invitation - true if it's an invitation, false otherwise

    • isRead

      public boolean isRead()
      Checks whether the notification has been read.

    • sendNotification

      public void sendNotification(android.content.Context context)
      Sends a notification to the user. This method creates the notification and posts it to the system's notification manager.
      Parameters:
      context - the application context
